foods.name: Rainbow Smoothie Bowl
foods.description: A colorful blend of tropical fruits topped with fresh berries, granola, and coconut flakes
foods.mood_benefit: Rich in vitamin C and antioxidants to boost serotonin levels
recipe_steps: Blend frozen mango, pineapple, and banana until smooth
Pour into bowl and arrange toppings in colorful patterns
Enjoy immediately for best texture

foods.name: Avocado Toast with Poached Egg
foods.description: Creamy avocado on whole grain bread topped with a perfectly poached egg
foods.mood_benefit: B vitamins and omega-3s support dopamine production
recipe_steps: Toast bread to golden perfection
Mash avocado with lemon juice and seasonings
Top with poached egg and enjoy

foods.description: Warm, nourishing soup with tender chicken, vegetables, and healing herbs
foods.mood_benefit: Tryptophan in chicken helps produce mood-stabilizing serotonin
recipe_steps: Simmer chicken with vegetables in seasoned broth
Shred chicken and return to pot
Serve hot with fresh herbs

foods.name: Dark Chocolate Oatmeal
foods.description: Creamy oats with rich dark chocolate and a touch of honey
foods.mood_benefit: Dark chocolate releases endorphins and contains mood-boosting compounds

Stir in dark chocolate and honey
Top with extra chocolate shavings

foods.mood_benefit: Chamomile reduces cortisol; magnesium in almonds helps relax muscles

Add honey and lemon to taste
Enjoy with a handful of almonds

foods.mood_benefit: Mediterranean diet supports overall brain health and mood stability
recipe_steps: Combine fresh vegetables in a bowl
Crumble feta cheese on top
Drizzle with olive oil and herbs
